_meanings:
{@--1@} Rinsing the mouth, 
sipping water before religious 
ceremonies, before and after meals &c.
from the palm of the hand;  
{#dadyAdAcamanaM tataH#} <ls>Y. 1. 242</ls>, <ls n="Y. 1.">195</ls> (part of
the water sipped being usually 
allowed to drop down).

{@--2@} The
water used for rinsing the mouth.
